entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:19 AM NST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
